column5: BRUSSELS  June 7 CK Hutchison Holdings  has offered concessions in a bid to secure EU antitrust approval for its plan to merge its Italian mobile business with that of Vimpelcom  the European Commission said on Tuesday.

column4: UPDATE 3-FDA panel backs Teva's abuse-resistant opioid painkiller
column5: June 7 A U.S. advisory panel recommended approving Teva Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd's   long-acting opioid painkiller  Vantrela ER  saying data showed it has some abuse-resistant properties.

column4: French refinery strikes to keep pressure on government ahead of Euro: CGT
column5: PARIS Strikes at five French refineries will continue until Friday  the start of the Euro 2016 soccer tournament hosted by France  in order to maintain pressure on the government to withdraw a contested labor reform  a CGT union official said.
